position:
Next Business Media | PMPÂ® Certified | Hiring for Tech | Investor

I host networking events that enable business owners, directors, and entrepreneurs to expand their companies and collaborate.

experience.title: Chief Executive Officer
experience.description: CEO at Next Business Media, a premier event organizer for industry-leading conferences covering AgriTech, Transport & Logistics, Energy, Fintech, and PropTech sectors. Spearheading the company's strategic growth and driving innovation in event experiences.At Next Business Media, I lead the execution of flagship events: AgriNext Conference (AgriTech), TransportNext Conference (Transport & Logistics), Energy Evolution Expo (Oil, Mining, Gas & Renewable Energy), FiNext Conference (Fintech), and PropNext Conference (PropTech). These world-class platforms foster knowledge-sharing, networking, and business opportunities within their respective industries.Leveraging extensive industry expertise and a customer-centric approach, I oversee the planning, execution, and continual enhancement of our events, ensuring exceptional experiences for attendees, exhibitors, and sponsors alike. With a focus on innovation and emerging trends, I strategically position our events to address the evolving needs of these dynamic sectors.Committed to driving growth and expanding Next Business Media's footprint, I actively explore new business opportunities, partnerships, and potential event launches in untapped markets. My leadership encompasses financial oversight, talent development, brand management, and fostering a culture of excellence within the organization.
